name: Collect (Standard)
short_description: Allows health workers to complete & send reports to a Medic instance
long_description: This app is for users of Medic's Standard Package. Please contact hello@medic.org if you need help getting started! Using Collect by Medic health workers register people into health programs, screen for high-risk pregnancies, report about pregnancy or immunization visits, and more. Reports can be submitted using data (mobile internet, or wifi) as well as SMS.
